"Galphur Meat":
"I heard the Naberian hinterlands are a perpetually
frozen wasteland. Is that really true? If so, the
native species living in that harsh environment
must be nice and lean--the perfect meat for one
of my recipes! I'm thinking about the meat of the
Galphur in particular. And as you no doubt
guessed, I need you to go get some for me.
Won't you please?

*Target: Galphurs level 31 or higher"

"ナベリウスの奥地に凍土が広がってるって
話を聞いたけど、それってホント？
そんな過酷な環境にいる原生生物は
きっと身体が引き締まっていて
いい食材になると思うのよね。
でさ、でさ！　その凍土にいる
ガルフルの肉、なんだけど
お察しの通り、取ってきてくれないかな？

※Lv.31～のガルフルが対象"
